info.title: OS2Kitos API - V2
info.description:
OBS: Dokumentation for V1 findes ved at skifte version på dokumentet til 1 øverst på siden

KITOS API V2 understøtter både læse- og skriveoperationer for de væsentlige registreringsobjekter i KITOS.

Se mere om designet og konventionerne i API'et her: API V2.

Generelt er anvendelsen af KITOS API(er) beskrevet på projektets Confluence side.

get.summary: Returns all Data-Processing-Registrations available to the user

parameters.name: organizationUuid
parameters.description: Organization UUID filter

parameters.name: systemUuid
parameters.description: System UUID filter

parameters.name: systemUsageUuid
parameters.description: SystemUsage UUID filter

parameters.name: dataProcessorUuid
parameters.description: UUID of a data processor in the registration

parameters.name: subDataProcessorUuid
parameters.description: UUID of a sub data processor in the registration

parameters.name: agreementConcluded
parameters.description: Filter based on whether or not an agreement has been concluded

parameters.name: changedSinceGtEq
parameters.description: Include only changes which were LastModified (UTC) is equal to or greater than the provided value

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
0-based page number. Use this parameter to page through the requested collection.
Offset in the source collection will be (pageSize * page)
Range: [0,2^31] Default: 0

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description:
Size of the page referred by 'page'.
Range: [1,100] Default: 100.

post.summary: Create a new data processing registration

get.summary: Returns a specific Data-Processing-Registration

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of Data-Processing-Registration entity

put.summary:
Perform a full update of an existing data processing registration.
Note: PUT expects a full version of the updated registration. For partial updates, please use PATCH.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the data processing registration

delete.summary: Removes an existing data processing registration.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the data processing registration

patch.summary: Allows partial updates of an existing data processing registration using json merge patch semantics (RFC7396)

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the data processing registration

get.summary: Returns Data Processing Registration basis for transfer options which are available for new registrations within the organization

parameters.name: organizationUuid
parameters.description: organization context for the basis for transfer availability

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
0-based page number. Use this parameter to page through the requested collection.
Offset in the source collection will be (pageSize * page)
Range: [0,2^31] Default: 0
NOTE: This parameter has no effect if 'pageSize' is left unspecified

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description:
Size of the page referred by 'page'.
Range: [1,2^31] Default: null.
If left unspecified, the entire result set will be returned.

post.summary: Creates a new it-contract in the requested organization

get.summary: Returns requested IT-Contract

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: Specific IT-Contract UUID

put.summary:
Updates an existing it-contract
Note: PUT expects a full version of the updated contract. For partial updates, please use PATCH.

parameters.name: contractUuid
parameters.description: UUID of the contract in KITOS

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Full update of the contract

patch.summary: Allows partial updates of an existing it-contract using json merge patch semantics (RFC7396)

parameters.name: contractUuid
parameters.description: UUID of the contract in KITOS

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Full update of the contract

0-based page number. Use this parameter to page through the requested collection.
Offset in the source collection will be (pageSize * page)
Range: [0,2^31] Default: 0

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description:
Size of the page referred by 'page'.
Range: [1,100] Default: 100.

post.summary: Creates a new IT-System based on given input values

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: A collection of specific IT-System values

get.summary: Returns requested IT-System

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: Specific IT-System UUID

put.summary:
Sets IT-System values
If a property value is not provided, KITOS will fallback to the default value of the type and that will be written to the it-system so remember to define all data specified in the request DTO want them to have a value after the request.
Required properties dictate the minimum value set accepted by KITOS.
NOTE: Only active systems can be modified.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: Specific IT-System UUID

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: Specific IT-System UUID

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Reason for deactivation

patch.summary:
Partially updates an existing it-system using json merge patch semantics (RFC7396)
NOTE: Only active systems can be modified.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: Specific IT-System UUID

409.description: Another system usage has already been created for the system within the specified organization

get.summary: Returns a specific IT-System usage (a specific IT-System in a specific Organization)

parameters.name: systemUsageUuid
parameters.description: UUID of the system usage entity

put.summary:
Perform a full update of an existing system usage.
Note: PUT expects a full version of the system usage. For partial updates, please use PATCH.

delete.summary:
Deletes a system usage.
NOTE: this action also clears any incoming relation e.g. relations from other system usages, contracts or data processing registrations.

patch.summary:
Allows partial updates of an existing system usage
NOTE:At the root level, defined sections will be mapped as changes e.g. {General: null} will reset the entire "General" section.
If the section is not provided in the json, the omitted section will remain unchanged.
At the moment we only manage PATCH at the root level so all levels below that must be provided in it's entirety.

get.summary: Gets a specific relation
Returns It-System Usage archive location options which are available for new registrations within the organization

uuid.description: UUID which is unique within collection of entities of the same type

name.description: Human readable name of the entity

uuid.description: UUID which is unique within collection of entities of the same type

name.description: Human readable name of the entity

dataResponsibleRemark.description: Additional remark related to the data responsible

isAgreementConcluded.description: Determines if a data processing agreement has been concluded

isAgreementConcludedRemark.description: Remark related to whether or not an agreement has been concluded

agreementConcludedAt.description: Describes the date when the data processing agreement was concluded

transferToInsecureThirdCountries.description: Determines if the data processing includes transfer to insecure third countries

insecureCountriesSubjectToDataTransfer.description: Which insecure third countries are subject to data transfer as part of the data processing

dataProcessors.description: UUID's of the organization entities selected as data processors

hasSubDataProcessors.description: Determines if the data processing involves sub data processors

subDataProcessors.description: UUID's of the organization entities selected as sub data processors

valid.description:
Determines if the entity is considered valid. Validity is determined by
- the MainContract Validity.

mainContract.description: Defines the master contract for this data processing registration (many contracts can point to a data processing registration but only one can be the master contract)

oversightOptionsRemark.description: Remark related to the selected oversight options

oversightInterval.description: Determines the interval of the oversight activity

isOversightCompleted.description: Determines if an oversight activity has been completed

oversightCompletedRemark.description: Remark related to the oversight completion

oversightScheduledInspectionDate.description: Determines the date of a scheduled inspection

RoleAssignmentResponseDTO.description: Defines a generic assignment DTO representing the assignment of a role option to a KITOS User

user.description: KITOS user which the role has been assigned to

role.description: Specific role option assigned to the user.

ExternalReferenceDataDTO.description: User defined external references attached to a KITOS entity

title.description: Reference title as shown in KITOS UI

url.description:
URL e.g. data sheet or other supplier related url.
Also accepts ESDH system url's following the pattern: (kmdsageraabn|kmdedhvis|sbsyslauncher):.*

masterReference.description:
Determines if this is the master reference for the KITOS entity
Constraint: Only one external reference can be marked as the master reference

remark.description: Optional remark related to the oversight

organizationUuid.description: UUID of the organization the data processing registration will be created in

name.description:
Name of the registration
Constraints:
    - Max length: 200
    - Name must be unique within the organization

systemUsageUuids.description:
UUIDs of associated it-system-usage entities
Constraints:
    - No duplicates
    - System usages must be belong to the same organization as this data processing registration

roles.description:
Data processing role assignments
Constraints:
    - Users must be members of the same organization as this data processing registration
    - Role options must be available in the organization of the data processing registration

dataResponsibleUuid.description:
Optional data responsible selection
Constraints:
    - If changed from existing value, the option must currently be available in the organization

dataResponsibleRemark.description: Additional remark related to the data responsible

isAgreementConcluded.description: Determines if a data processing agreement has been concluded

isAgreementConcludedRemark.description: Remark related to whether or not an agreement has been concluded

agreementConcludedAt.description:
Describes the date when the data processing agreement was concluded
Constraints:
    - IsAgreementConcluded equals 'yes'

basisForTransferUuid.description:
Optional basis for transfer selection
Constraints:
    - If changed from existing value, the option must currently be available in the organization

transferToInsecureThirdCountries.description: Determines if the data processing includes transfer to insecure third countries

insecureCountriesSubjectToDataTransferUu.description:
Which insecure third countries are subject to data transfer as part of the data processing
Constraints:
    - TransferToInsecureThirdCountries equals 'yes'
    - Duplicates are not allowed
    - If changed from existing value, the options must currently be available in the organization

dataProcessorUuids.description:
UUID's of the organization entities selected as data processors
Constraints:
    - No duplicates

hasSubDataProcessors.description: Determines if the data processing involves sub data processors

subDataProcessorUuids.description:
UUID's of the organization entities selected as sub data processors
Constraints:
    - HasSubDataProcesors equals 'yes'
    - No duplicates

mainContractUuid.description:
Defines the master contract for this Data Processing Registration (many contracts can point to a DPR but only one can be the master contract)
Constraint: The contract provided MUST point to this Data Processing Registration for it to be selected as "main contract".

oversightOptionUuids.description:
Applied oversight options.
Constraints:
    - No duplicates
    - Option must be available in the organization

oversightOptionsRemark.description: Remark related to the selected oversight options

oversightInterval.description: Determines the interval of the oversight activity

isOversightCompleted.description: Determines if an oversight activity has been completed

oversightCompletedRemark.description: Remark related to the oversight completion

oversightScheduledInspectionDate.description: Determines the date of a scheduled inspection

oversightDates.description:
Specific dates where the oversight activity took place
Constraints:
    - IsOversightCompleted equals yes

roleUuid.description:
UUID of the role option
Constraints:
    - Role must be available in the organization

userUuid.description:
UUID of the user
Constraints:
    - User must be a member of the organization

name.description:
Name of the registration
Constraints:
    - Max length: 200
    - Name must be unique within the organization

systemUsageUuids.description:
UUIDs of associated it-system-usage entities
Constraints:
    - No duplicates
    - System usages must be belong to the same organization as this data processing registration

roles.description:
Data processing role assignments
Constraints:
    - Users must be members of the same organization as this data processing registration
    - Role options must be available in the organization of the data processing registration

UnboundedPaginationQuery.description: Defines the an unbounded pagination query parameter set

page.description:
0-based page number. Use this parameter to page through the requested collection.
Offset in the source collection will be (pageSize * page)
Range: [0,2^31] Default: 0
NOTE: This parameter has no effect if 'pageSize' is left unspecified

pageSize.description:
Size of the page referred by 'page'.
Range: [1,2^31] Default: null.
If left unspecified, the entire result set will be returned.

isAvailable.description:
IsAvailable is set to true if the type is available in the requested organization context.
If set to false, changes which point to this will fail since it has been deprecated within the organization.
Existing registrations will be unaffected.

uuid.description: UUID which is unique within collection of entities of the same type

name.description: Human readable name of the entity

writeAccess.description: Determines if this role grants write access to the entity through which it has been created

name.description: Human readable name of the entity

isAvailable.description:
IsAvailable is set to true if the type is available in the requested organization context.
If set to false, changes which point to this will fail since it has been deprecated within the organization.
Existing registrations will be unaffected.

writeAccess.description: Determines if this role grants write access to the entity through which it has been created

uuid.description: UUID which is unique within collection of entities of the same type

name.description: Human readable name of the entity
Name of IT-Contract

organizationContext.description: Organization in which the contract was created

lastModifiedBy.description: Reference to the user who last modified the contract

createdBy.description: Reference to the user who created the contract

dataProcessingRegistrations.description: Data processing registrations associated with this it-contract

organization.description: Optional reference to the supplier organization

signed.description: Determines if the contract has been signed by the supplier

signedBy.description: Who, at the supplier, signed the contract

signedAt.description: Which date was the contract signed by the supplier

signed.description: Determines if the contract has been signed

signedBy.description: Who, in the organization, signed the contract

signedAt.description: Which date was the contract signed

operationsRemunerationStartedAt.description: The data at which operations remuneration started

durationYears.description: If the agreement has a fixed duration, optionally define the years + months for which it is valid

durationMonths.description: If the agreement has a fixed duration, optionally define the years + months for which it is valid

isContinuous.description: Determines if the agreement has no fixed duration

extensionOptionsUsed.description: Determines how many of the agreement available extension options that have been used

irrevocableUntil.description: The agreement cannot be revoked before this date

terminatedAt.description: The date at which the contract was terminated

valid.description: Determines if the entity is considered valid. This is computed from both "EnforcedValid" as well as ValidAccordingToValidityPeriod.

enforcedValid.description: Determines if this entity has been forced into valid state even if context properties would dictate otherwise (e.g. no longer in use)

validFrom.description: If specified, the entity is valid from this date.

validTo.description: If specified, the entity is valid up until and including this date.

quarterOfYear.description:
Which half of the year is the procurement plan for.
Range:
    - 1: First quarter of the year
    - 2: Second quarter of the year
    - 3: Third quarter of the year
    - 4: Fourth quarter of the year

year.description: Which year the procurement plan is for

noticePeriodMonths.description:
Optionally assigned notice period
Constraints:
    - If changed from current state, the option type must be available in the organization

noticeByEndOf.description: Defines a fixed termination notice schema

organizationUnit.description: Optionally defined the organization unit responsible for the payment

acquisition.description: Part of payment which covers acquisition

operation.description: Part of payment which covers operations

other.description: Part of payment which is not classified as either operations or acquisition

auditStatus.description: The result of the specific payment audit

auditDate.description: Defines the date at which the payment was audited

name.description:
Name of the contract.
Constraints:
    - Max length: 200 characters
    - Must be unique within the organization

parentContractUuid.description:
UUID of the optional parent contract
Constraints:
    - Parent and child contract must belong to the same organization

IT-System usages covered by this it-contract
Constraints:
    - System usages must belong to the same organization as the it-contract
    - No duplicates

dataProcessingRegistrationUuids.description:
Data processing registrations associated with this it-contract
Constraints:
    - Must belong to the same organization as the it-contract
    - No duplicates

    - If changed from current state, the option type must be available in the organization

contractTemplateUuid.description:

    - If changed from current state, the option type must be available in the organization

agreementElementUuids.description:

    - If changed from current state, the option types must be available in the organization

criticalityUuid.description:

purchaseTypeUuid.description:

    - If changed from current state, the option type must be available in the organization

procurementStrategyUuid.description:
Optionally assigned procurement strategy
Constraints:
    - If changed from current state, the option type must be available in the organization

signed.description: Determines if the contract has been signed by the supplier

signedAt.description: Which date was the contract signed by the supplier

Optional reference responsible organization unit

    - Must be a organization unit of the Organization to which the contract belongs

signed.description: Determines if the contract has been signed

signedBy.description: Who, in the organization, signed the contract

signedAt.description: Which date was the contract signed

paymentFrequencyUuid.description:
Optionally assigned payment frequency

    - If changed from current state, the option type must be available in the organization

paymentModelUuid.description:

    - If changed from current state, the option type must be available in the organization

priceRegulationUuid.description:

    - If changed from current state, the option type must be available in the organization

durationYears.description:
If the agreement has a fixed duration, optionally define the years + months for which it is valid
Constraints:
    - If DurationMonths/Years are defined then IsContinuous must be null or false

durationMonths.description:
If the agreement has a fixed duration, optionally define the years + months for which it is valid
Constraints:
    - If DurationMonths/Years are defined then IsContinuous must be null or false

isContinuous.description:
Determines if the agreement has no fixed duration
Constraints:
    - If set to true, the DurationMonths/Years must be null

extensionOptionsUuid.description:
Optional agreement extension option
Constraints:
    - If changed from current state, the option type must be available in the organization

extensionOptionsUsed.description: Determines how many of the agreement available extension options that have been used

irrevocableUntil.description: The agreement cannot be revoked before this date

terminatedAt.description: The date at which the contract was terminated

enforcedValid.description: Determines if the entity has been forced into valid state even if context properties would dictate otherwise (e.g. no longer in use)

validFrom.description:
If specified, the entity is valid from this date.
Must be less than or equal to ValidTo

validTo.description:
If specified, the entity is valid up until and including this date.
Must be greater than or equal to ValidFrom

noticePeriodMonthsUuid.description:
Optionally assigned notice period
Constraints:
    - If changed from current state, the option type must be available in the organization

noticeByEndOf.description: Defines a fixed termination notice schema

Optionally defined the organization unit responsible for the payment
Constraints:
    - Organization unit must belong to the same organization as the contract

operation.description: Part of payment which covers operations

other.description: Part of payment which is not classified as either operations or acquisition

auditDate.description: Defines the date at which the payment was audited

created.description: Date of creation. (on some legacy systems , this information is not available. If so, it will be null)

parentSystem.description: UUID for possible IT-System parent (if any)

name.description: Name of IT-System

kle.description: List of KLE number representations as name and UUID pairs

businessType.description: Name and UUID pair for IT-System business type

exposedInterfaces.description: List of IT-Interfaces exposed by this IT-System

created.description: Date of creation (on some legacy systems , this information is not available. If so, it will be null)

parentSystem.description: UUID for possible IT-System parent (if any)

name.description: Name of IT-System

kle.description: List of KLE number representations as name and UUID pairs

businessType.description: Name and UUID pair for IT-System business type

exposedInterfaces.description: List of IT-Interfaces exposed by this IT-System

created.description: Date of creation (on some legacy systems , this information is not available. If so, it will be null)

uuid.description:
UUID for IT-System
If no uuid is provided, KITOS will assign one automatically

parentUuid.description: UUID for possible IT-System parent (if any)

name.description: Name of IT-System

kleUuids.description: UUID's for KLE numbers categorizing this IT-System

kleUuids.description: UUID's for KLE numbers categorizing this IT-System

kleUuids.description: UUID's for KLE numbers categorizing this IT-System

ItSystemUsageResponseDTO.description:
NOTE: IT-System usages are registrations which extend those of a system within the context of a specific organization.
IT-System usages have their own lifecycle and identity but the human readable name is inherited from the system context.

uuid.description: UUID of the IT-System usage registration instance

createdBy.description: User who created the system usage

systemContext.description: IT-System which this organizational usage is based on

organizationContext.description: Organization in which the system usage has been created

roles.description: A collection of IT-System usage role option assignments

organizationUsage.description: Defines the use of the system within the organization

localKLEDeviations.description: Defines IT-System KLE deviations locally within an organization. All deviations are in the context of the inherited deviations which are found on the IT-System context

outgoingSystemRelations.description: Contains registered relations to other system usages within the organization

localSystemId.description: System Id assigned locally within the organization

localCallName.description: Call name used locally within the organization

dataClassification.description: Optional classification of the registered data

notes.description: Notes relevant to the system usage within the organization

numberOfExpectedUsers.description: Interval which defines the number of expected users this system has within the organization

validity.description: Specifies the validity of this system usage

mainContract.description: Defines the master contract for this system (many contracts can point to a system usage but only one can be the master contract)

usingOrganizationUnits.description: A collection of organization units which have taken this system into use

responsibleOrganizationUnit.description: Out of all of the using organization units, this one is responsible for the system within the organization.

LocalKLEDeviationsResponseDTO.description: Defines IT-System KLE deviations locally within an organization. All deviations are in the context of the inherited deviations which are found on the IT-System

removedKLE.description: Inherited KLE which have been removed locally

addedKLE.description: KLE which has been added locally

archiveDuty.description: Archive duty for the system in the organization context. The recommendation from the archiving authority is found on the IT-System context.

type.description: Defines the archiving type associated with the it-system

location.description: Identifies the physical location for archive receiving the data

testLocation.description: Identifies the physical location for the archiving test

active.description: Determines if any archiving has occurred from this system

frequencyInMonths.description: Determines the frequency of the archiving activity

uuid.description: UUID of the system relation registration

toSystemUsage.description: Identifies the system usage the relation points to

associatedContract.description: The contract association of the system relation

lowerBound.description:
Optional lower bound.
If left unspecified, the interval has no lower bound.

upperBound.description:
Optional upper bound
If left unspecified the interval has no upper bound.

valid.description: Determines if the entity is considered valid. This is computed from ValidAccordingToValidityPeriod, ValidAccordingToLifeCycle and ValidAccordingToMainContract.

validAccordingToValidityPeriod.description: Determines if the entity is considered valid based on the validity period defined by ValidFrom and ValidTo

validAccordingToLifeCycle.description: Determines if the entity is considered valid based on the Life Cycle

validAccordingToMainContract.description: Determines if the entity is considered valid based on the validity of the related contract

lifeCycleStatus.description: Life cycle status of the entity

validFrom.description: If specified, the entity is valid from this date.

validTo.description: If specified, the entity is valid up until and including this date.

name.description: Name displayed to the user in kitos

systemUuid.description:
Points to the main system which the usage will extend.
Constraints:
    - must be accessible to the authorized user
    - must not already be in use in the organization
    - system must be active iow. not in a disabled state

roles.description:
A collection of IT-System usage role option assignments
Constraint: Duplicates are not allowed

organizationUsage.description: Contains organizational references for the system usage

localKleDeviations.description: Added/removed KLE when compared to inherited KLE from the IT-System

archiving.description: Defines archiving related properties for this system usage

externalReferences.description:
User defined external references.
The external reference marked as "master reference" will be shown in overviews and on the system front page in KITOS
Constraint:
    - If the list is not empty one (and only one) must be marked as the master reference.

localSystemId.description:
System Id assigned locally within the organization
Max length: 200

localCallName.description:
Call name used locally within the organization
Max length: 100

dataClassificationUuid.description:
Optional classification of the registered data
Constraint: If an update changes this field, the option identified must be currently available in the organization context

notes.description: Notes relevant to the system usage within the organization

systemVersion.description:
Locally registered system version
Max length: 100

usingOrganizationUnitUuids.description: UUIds of Organization units using this system

responsibleOrganizationUnitUuid.description:
Out of all of the using organization units, this one is responsible for the system within the organization.
Constraint: The uuid provided must also be present in UsingOrganizationUnitUuids

removedKLEUuids.description:
Inherited KLE which have been removed locally
Constraints:
    - No duplicates
    - Contents CANNOT intersect with AddedKLEUuids
    - Contents MUST be a complete subset of the KLE set on the system context

addedKLEUuids.description:
KLE which has been added locally
Constraints:
    - No duplicates
    - Contents CANNOT intersect with RemovedKLEUuids
    - Contents CANNOT be a subset of the KLE set on the system context

archiveDuty.description: Archive duty for the system in the organization context. The recommendation from the archiving authority is found on the IT-System context.

typeUuid.description:
Defines the archiving type associated with the it-system
Constraint: If an update changes this field, the option identified must be currently available in the organization context

locationUuid.description:
Identifies the physical location for archive receiving the data
Constraint: If an update changes this field, the option identified must be currently available in the organization context

testLocationUuid.description:
Identifies the physical location for the archiving test
Constraint: If an update changes this field, the option identified must be currently available in the organization context

active.description: Determines if any archiving has occurred from this system

frequencyInMonths.description: Determines the frequency of the archiving activity

sensitivePersonDataUuids.description: Constraint: If an update changes this field, the option identified must be currently available in the organization context

specificPersonalData.description: Constraint: Can only be added if DataSensitivityLevelChoice.PersonData is present in DataSensitivityLevels field

registeredDataCategoryUuids.description: Constraint: If an update changes this field, the option identified must be currently available in the organization context

lifeCycleStatus.description: Determines the life cycle status of the system (e.g. Not in use, Operational)

validFrom.description:
If specified, the entity is valid from this date.
Must be less than or equal to ValidTo

validTo.description:
If specified, the entity is valid up until and including this date.
Must be greater than or equal to ValidFrom

roles.description:
A collection of IT-System usage role option assignments
Constraint: Duplicates are not allowed

organizationUsage.description: Contains organizational references for the system usage

localKleDeviations.description: Added/removed KLE when compared to inherited KLE from the IT-System

archiving.description: Defines archiving related properties for this system usage

externalReferences.description:
User defined external references.
The external reference marked as "master reference" will be shown in overviews and on the system front page in KITOS
Constraint:
    - If the list is not empty one (and only one) must be marked as the master reference.

mainContractUuid.description:
Defines the master contract for this system (many contracts can point to a system usage but only one can be the master contract)
Constraint: The contract provided MUST point to this system usage for it to be selected as "main contract".

localSystemId.description:
System Id assigned locally within the organization
Max length: 200

localCallName.description:
Call name used locally within the organization
Max length: 100

dataClassificationUuid.description:
Optional classification of the registered data
Constraint: If an update changes this field, the option identified must be currently available in the organization context

notes.description: Notes relevant to the system usage within the organization

systemVersion.description:
Locally registered system version
Max length: 100

toSystemUsageUuid.description: Identifies the system usage the relation points to

relationInterfaceUuid.description:
The relation uses the interface
The interface must be exposed by the system identified by ToSystemUsageUuid

associatedContractUuid.description:
The contract association of the system relation
The contract must be defined in the same organization as the it-system usages.

relationFrequencyUuid.description:
Frequency of the relation
If part of a new relation or a change, the option must be enabled in the organization context.

VersionedKLEResponseDTO[IEnumerable[KLED.description: Wraps the KLE response payload with a reference to the data from api.kle-online.dk

referenceVersion.description: Defines the version of KLE (from api.kle-online.dk) which the content in 'payload' is based on.

VersionedKLEResponseDTO[KLEDetailsDTO].description: Wraps the KLE response payload with a reference to the data from api.kle-online.dk

referenceVersion.description: Defines the version of KLE (from api.kle-online.dk) which the content in 'payload' is based on.

uuid.description: UUID which is unique within collection of entities of the same type

name.description: Human readable name of the entity

apiAccess.description: Determines if the user credentials can be used to request a KITOS API token

roles.description: Roles assigned to the user within the context of the organization

uuid.description: UUID which is unique within collection of entities of the same type

name.description: Human readable name of the entity

parentOrganizationUnit.description: Optional Link to parent unit in the organizational hierarchy

ean.description: Optional EAN number for the organization unit.

uuid.description: UUID which is unique within collection of entities of the same type

name.description: Human readable name of the entity
